aboutFacts.title: Comp Sci
aboutFacts.description: My biggest passion is CS. There are just endless creative (and professional) opportunies that lie with developing software.

aboutFacts.title: Music
aboutFacts.description: I started producing music about 2 years ago. Nothing beats the satisfaction of exporting a real banger.

aboutFacts.title: Chess
aboutFacts.description: I've been playing chess since the 2nd grade. I used to play in tournaments but now just online.Caro-Kann for the win!

aboutFacts.title: Poker
aboutFacts.description: I picked up poker this year and am having a blast with friends and club sessions. I almost got a royal flush once!

aboutFacts.title: Gym
aboutFacts.description: Bench 225! 180? Eh, more like sub-135 for now, but I'm working on it! I've been a few months consistent now.

aboutFacts.title: Sports
aboutFacts.description: A game of basketball or tennis is my jam when it comes to sports. It brings some fun, friendly competition to a reunion.

aboutFacts.title: Cooking
aboutFacts.description: Ever since moving into an apt, I've started cooking my own meals. It took a few tries, but my Risotto and Jambalaya are to die for.
